articles.description: Novak Djokovic beats Carlos Alcaraz in thrilling fashion to clinch a long-awaited Olympic title and complete the career 'Golden Slam'.
articles.title: Olympic tennis: Novak Djokovic beats Carlos Alcaraz to win gold and seal 'Golden Slam'

articles.description: Great Britain's Tommy Fleetwood takes Olympic silver in the men’s golf after an enthralling final day where Scottie Scheffler wins gold.
articles.title: Olympic golf: Tommy Fleetwood takes silver medal as Scottie Scheffler wins gold

articles.description: Great Britain win their fifth equestrian medal of the Paris Olympics on day nine of the 2024 Games through Charlotte Fry.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Charlotte Fry wins Great Britain's fifth equestrian medal of Olympics

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage as promoted Dundee United open their Premiership campaign against Dundee before two more fixtures.
articles.title: Dundee United v Dundee & two more Premiership games - radio & text

articles.description: Great Britain's Amber Rutter takes silver in a dramatic and controversial final of the women's skeet shooting as Francisca Crovetto Chadid claims gold in a shoot-off.
articles.title: Paris 2024 skeet shooting: Team GB's Amber Rutter takes silver in controversial final

articles.description: Harry Hepworth becomes the first British man to win an Olympic vault medal with bronze in Paris.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Harry Hepworth wins historic bronze in vault

articles.description: England opener Zak Crawley is ruled out of the three-Test series against Sri Lanka, which starts this month.
articles.title: Zak Crawley: England opener out of Sri Lanka Test series with broken finger

articles.description: Liverpool make it three wins from three on their US tour with a 3-0 win against Manchester United in Columbia, in front of 77,559 fans.
articles.title: Liverpool 3-0 Man Utd: Carvalho, Jones and Tsimikas on target in easy Reds win
